title: Malzahar changes
body:
Honestly with the changes coming up for mages i hope they don't hurt my Malzahar. To me Malzahar is one of the best dueling champion in the game and hope that riot doasn't change that about him, his E (space aids) and R is one of my favorite things about him. He is literally my best mid laner {{champion:90}} 
P.S. if they remove his space aids, they basically removed the fire from a burning flame
